tweet.text: Edward J. Perkins was appointed Ambassador to the United Nations, #Liberia, #SouthAfrica, and #Australia. He served as @StateDG and retired with rank of Career Minister in the Foreign Service. https://t.co/XWcZeJSTTS #Twitterstorians #BlackHistoryMonth
tweet.html: Edward J. Perkins was appointed Ambassador to the United Nations, #Liberia, #SouthAfrica, and #Australia. He served as @StateDG and retired with rank of Career Minister in the Foreign Service. go.usa.gov/xnFt5 #Twitterstorians #BlackHistoryMonth
